name: Holiday Inn Express Frankfurt-Messe

reviews.text: After a few years away from this hotel, I spent three nights during the Christmas Holidays. It has not changed much, still friendly staff, comfortable rooms, flat screen TV with many more channels than my last visit, clean bathroom, no amenities in the bathroom except soap, so be sure to bring your own. Great buffet breakfast included. Wifi is free in the lobby, but if you want it in your room you will have to pay for it, and it is LAN. Hotel is located about 15/20 minute walk from the Hauptbahnhof. Bus 37 which departs from in front of the train station will take you almost to the front door in less than 8 minutes.
reviews.title: Hotel revisited

reviews.text: I stayed over night in a twin room as myself and my daughter were visiting the Christmas markets.
reviews.title: Basic and Tired

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The ladies in reception were very helpful and check in was quick and easy. They furnished us with lots of good advice about buses etc - which is why this has got an average rating rather than poor.
reviews.title: Left jewellery in the room and it was stolen!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was on the 5th floor and was labelled as IHG members - I have Platinum status, so have used the hotels quite extensively. The room was small and dirty, there were large stains on the carpet - my daughter joked that it looked as if someone had been murdered there!
reviews.title: break in frankfurt

reviews.text: The bedding whilst clean had seen better days - my daughter's duvet cover actually had three large holes in it. If we hadn't just been staying over night I would have asked to be moved - but by the time we had got back to the hotel having visited the markets it was very late and we just wanted to sleep.
reviews.title: Tiny but clean room

description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Frankfurt Messe! The hotel offers 175 comfortable and well-equipped rooms on 5 floors, including 2 rooms suitable for disabled guests and also smoking and non-smoking rooms. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, high-speed Internet connection and tea and coffee making facilities. Start your day with our complimentary breakfast buffet! The hotel also offers 3 modern conference rooms with natural light, air conditioning and internet access and offers numerous conference materials for successful meetings for up to 60 people. The hotel is near the central railway station, the Festival Hall and the 'Messe Frankfurt' exhibition grounds (Euromold, Heimtextil, Paperworld, Ambiente, Buchmesse, ISH, ACHEMA, IAA, etc.) Frankfurt s Westhafen and Gallusviertel/Galluspark business quarters are in the direct vicinity of the hotel and the Hoechst Industrial Park and Eschborn can be easily reached by car. With easy connections to the A5 motorway and the city centre, the hotel is an ideal location for your overnight stays, conferences and meetings. You can enjoy live football matches of Eintracht Frankfurt and also concerts at the Commerzbank Arena. You can book tickets for the Rhein-Main transport authority and also tours directly at reception.
